label: TransportationWasteMaterial
comment: Any materials unused and rejected as unwanted resulting from transportation.

datatypeProperties.comment: The indication of whether or not a transportation waste material delivery is complete.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: A product certificate applicable to this production waste material component.
A characteristic applicable to this sustainability inspection.
A transportation waste recovery disposal process applicable to this transportation waste material.
A material component included in this transportation waste.
A next delivery event for this transportation waste material.
A previous delivery event for this transportation waste material.
A reception facility contact for this transportation waste material.
A measure of the volume of this distinct chemical.
A measure of a weight (mass) of this logistics packaging.

referencedBy.comment: Transportation waste material reported for this logistics transport movement.
